lead_paragraph: JP Duminy and Stephen Cook scored half centuries but four wickets for Suranga Lakmal and two for Rangana Herath restricted South Africa to 267 for six on the opening day of the first test against Sri Lanka on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Lakmal Wickets Ensure Honours Even After First Day
headline.main: Lakmal Wickets Ensure Honours Even After First Day

snippet: JP Duminy and Stephen Cook scored half centuries but four wickets for Suranga Lakmal and two for Rangana Herath restricted South Africa to 267 for six on the opening day of the first test against Sri Lanka on Monday....
